metadata.title: RZ/T2M: What operating systems are supported?

sections.content:
Question:
What operating systems are supported?
Answer:
FreeRTOS is supported with our Flexible Software Package (FSP). 
Please contact us with respect to other operating systems.
Suitable Products
RZ/T2M
